name: Web Design
description: Learn Web Design from the ground up, including ideation, UI and UX design, front-end code and a whole lot more. At the end of class you'll have the skills to understand and add value in almost any digital design role.

name: Python Engineering
description: Learn to analyze and publish data using Python and machine learning. At the end of the class you’ll make magic happen with real-world data sets and you'll know how to build web apps to show off your wizardry.

name: Mobile Engineering
description: Learn iOS app development using Xcode 5 and a whole lot of Objective-C. At the end of the class you’ll have the skills to create beautiful, fully functional iOS apps and the foundation to pursue building Mac apps.

name: Rails Engineering
description: Learn Ruby on Rails, one of the most popular server-side frameworks in the world. At the end of class you’ll know how to build fast, production-quality full-stack apps.

name: Front End Engineering
description: Learn Front End Engineering using HTML, CSS and JavaScript and basic server-side tech. At the end of the class you’ll have the skills to create beautiful, fully functional websites and web applications.
